## Assignment Build XML Structure

This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(XML)
```

```{r parseXML}
path <- "/Users/jacquelineguo/Documents/NEU/Spring 2022/CS5200/HW"
xmlFile <- "log.xml"

xmlDoc <- xmlParse(validate = F, file = paste(path, xmlFile, sep = "/"))
```

Find how many visit of page 200 in the xml file. The answer should be 3.
```{r}
xPathEx <- "count(//Visit[@PageREF=200])"
x <- xpathApply(xmlDoc, xPathEx)

print(x)
```

Find how many visit of page 100 in the xml file. The answer should be 1.
```{r}
xPathEx <- "count(//Visit[@PageREF=100])"
x <- xpathApply(xmlDoc, xPathEx)

print(x)
```

Find how many visit of visitor 101 in the xml file. The answer should be 2.
```{r}
xPathEx <- "count(//Visit[@VisitorREF=101])"
x <- xpathApply(xmlDoc, xPathEx)

print(x)
```
